TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class ListBox Inherits ListControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type ListBox = class inherit ListControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 表示允许单项或多项选择的列表框控件。

span.span: Represents a list box control that allows single or multiple item selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件创建列表控件允许单选或多项选择。Use the control to create a list control that allows single or multiple item selection. 使用属性来指定控件的高度。Use the property to specify the height of the control. 若要启用多个项选择，请设置属性设置为`ListSelectionMode.Multiple`。To enable multiple item selection, set the property to `ListSelectionMode.Multiple`. 若要指定要在中显示的项控件，将放置`ListItem`元素的开始和结束标记之间的每个条目控件。To specify the items that you want to appear in the control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 使用集合来检查中所含对象控件。Use the collection to examine the objects contained in the control. 例如，可以确定在选定的项控件进行枚举，从而集合和测试值为每个元素。For example, you can determine the selected item(s) in the control by enumerating the collection and testing the value for each element. 控件还支持数据绑定。The control also supports data binding. 若要将控件绑定到数据源，首先创建一个数据源，如之一对象，包含要在控件中显示的项。To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the objects, that contains the items to display in the control. 接下来，使用方法绑定到数据源控件。Next, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 使用并属性来指定要绑定到数据源中哪个字段`Text`和`Value`属性，分别，每个列表项控件中。Use the and properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties, respectively, of each list item in the control. 控件现在将显示来自数据源的信息。The control will now display the information from the data source. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何：防止通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串的 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，并[ASP.NET Web Pages 中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```              ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建支持多个选择的控件。The following example shows how to create a control that supports multiple selections. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox Example 2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/CS/source3cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox Example 2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/VB/source3vb.aspx#3)] 下面的示例演示如何创建通过数据绑定控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control through data binding. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox Example 2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox Example 2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox Example 2/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取当前在 控件中选定的项的索引值数组。

span.span: Gets the array of index values for currently selected items in the control.

returns.span: 一个整数数组，其中每个整数表示列表框中一个选定项的索引。

span.span: An array of integers, each representing the index of a selected item in the list box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来识别或访问中的选定的项控件。Use the method to identify or access the selected items in the control. 返回的数组中每个元素表示的选定的列表项的索引。Each element in the returned array represents the index for a selected list item. 可以使用索引值来访问中的项集合。You can use the index values to access the items in the collection.

span.span: if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生中的一个自定义控件时，使用方法主要由控件开发人员类。The method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the class. 方法指示的状态控制已更改。The method indicates if the state of the control has changed. 换而言之，它确定是否在控件中的每个列表项具有相同的最后一个已发布值的值。In other words, it determines if each list item in the control has the same value as the last posted value. 用户选择的控件更改中的项相应的值对象中的集合控件。A user selecting an item in the control changes the value for the corresponding object in the collection of the control. 如果在控件中，选择了一些列表项，或者如果处于禁用状态，返回`false`。If some list items are selected in the control, or if the is disabled, returns `false`. 当方法将返回`true`控件，ASP.NET 页面框架调用控件方法。When the method returns `true` for a control, the ASP.NET page framework invokes the method for the control.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

summary.span: 在客户端上呈现 控件之前对该控件进行配置。

span.span: Configures the control prior to rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生中的一个自定义控件时，使用方法主要由控件开发人员类。The method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the class. 方法允许派生的类来处理无需附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 方法执行之前保存的视图状态和呈现内容的任何必要预呈现步骤。The method performs any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content for the .

para.span: 重写时方法在派生类中，则一定要调用方法的基类以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 当 控件的已发布数据发生更改时，调用 方法。

span.span: Invokes the method whenever posted data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生中的一个自定义控件时，使用方法主要由控件开发人员控件。The method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the control. ASP.NET 页面框架调用方法控制何时方法指示列表项的状态已更改在控件。The ASP.NET page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the control. 方法调用方法来引发事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控件开发人员可以重写方法来执行自定义处理，当用户选择列表项控件中。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user selects list items in the control. 方法可以选择执行引发之前验证控件事件。The method can optionally perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要验证的一组在页上时中的列表项控件选择时，设置和属性设置为`true`，然后指定要在验证控件组属性。To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the is selected, set the and properties to `true`, and then specify the group of controls to validate in the property.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中显示的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the control.
The number of rows displayed in the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在中显示的行数控件。Use the property to specify the number of rows to display in the control. > [!CAUTION] > 行数必须介于 1 到 2000年之间。The number of rows must be between one and 2000. 在此范围之外的值将引发异常。Values outside of this range will raise an exception. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来显示中的六个行控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display six rows in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListBox.Rows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox.Rows Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListBox.Rows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListBox.Rows Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的行数小于 1 或大于 2000。

span.span: The specified number of rows is less than one or greater than 2000.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的选择模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the selection mode of the control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的模式行为的控件。Use the property to specify the mode behavior of the control. 此属性设置为`ListSelectionMode.Single`指示单个项可以选择从控件，而`ListSelectionMode.Multiple`指定可以选择多个项。Setting this property to `ListSelectionMode.Single` indicates only a single item can be selected from the control, while `ListSelectionMode.Multiple` specifies multiple items can be selected. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性，以允许用户选择从多个选择控件。The following example illustrates how to use the property to allow the user to select multiple selections from the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxSelectionMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxSelectionMode/CS/listboxselectionmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxSelectionMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxSelectionMode/VB/listboxselectionmodevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的选择模式不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified selection mode is not one of the values.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用方法以处理已发布的数据的更改对象。Typically, you should use the method to process posted data for changes to a object. 方法是显式接口成员实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定义自定义实现来处理已发布的数据对象，请重写成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for processing posted data for a object, override the member.

para.span: 显式接口实现调用方法来处理该控件的已发布的数据。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to process the posted data for the control.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 当 控件的已发布数据发生更改时，调用 方法。

span.span: Invokes the method whenever posted data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用方法来引发事件时的发送的数据对象更改。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event when the posted data for a object changes. 方法是显式接口成员实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定义用于引发该事件的自定义实现对象，请重写成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for raising the event for a object, override the member.

para.span: 显式接口实现调用方法来引发事件时发送的数据已更改的控件。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to raise the event when posted data has changed for the control.

related.span: ListBox Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ListBox Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ToolTip { get; set; }
.property instance string ToolTip
